entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 5:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -13.3°C
Wind: E 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or freezing rain. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to freezing rain or ice pellets near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Freezing rain mixed with rain. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to zero in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 12 January 2023
